title: Legal Resistance Network Formation and Operations
description: Document the formation and operations of legal resistance networks, including coordinated litigation strategies and pro bono legal support systems.
research_areas: What are the specific dates and actors involved in Legal Resistance Network Formation and Operations?
What are the financial amounts and policy changes related to this investigation?
How does this connect to broader institutional capture patterns?

source_requirements: Government documents, financial records, policy communications
